website_summaries.verdict: A headband with ice inserts for serious cooling action for head or neck.
pros: Can't beat these ice packs for their cooling effects
Hook-and-loop tape makes this headband adjustable for use also around eyes (for headaches), neck, and forehead
Popular for wear while working outside, and the cooling effect lasts through yard work like mowing the lawn
Also great for migraines as well as neck pain
cons: Ice packs can melt fast in hot conditions, so we recommend buying extra ice inserts to have on hand

customer_reviews.title: Better then advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product info doesn't say, and the Q&A says 2 strips come with the item, but that is wrong - it's 3. One is already installed and there is the equal of 2 strips included. The 2 extra are in one long string that you have to cut apart. And when I ordered the item, I was worried if it would fit comfortably as I have a 22 inch neck. It does fit fine and could be used by someone bigger easily. It is just what I wanted - not too wide and not too short - just perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: it is way better than ok
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to use while doing yard work. It has performed well beyond my expectations! I thought at this price it might just be ok but, it is way better than ok. Stays cold a significant amount of time. Actually still cold when I'm putting up the mower. Will definitely order another when this one is worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Works well for short workouts.
customer_reviews.text: This product really helps keep me cool and better able to keep up my workout pace on hot days. I stuffed in all the ice packs they sent instead of keeping some out as replacements as they suggest. You stsy cooler longer with more ice packs. Only drawback is even with all the extra ice it only lasts about an hour before all ice melts. Shipped quicly.
customer_reviews.author: Aanbuwacl

customer_reviews.title: Wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Well, it cools you off until the ice melts, which when out in the heat, working in the yard, happened too soon, IMO. The strip of ice is a series of small water-filled connected compartments which makes it flexible. If these were just a bit bigger, I’d give it an extra star, as it would last longer before losing its cooling power. It came with two strips, but for me it seems too much of a hassle to run inside, to the freezer, to change it out. I read you can order additional stops for freezing, so I suppose keeping them all in a small cooler outside, right beside you, might help.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what I use it to combat
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, wear it under my goalie gear when playing indoor Lacrosse. Lasts about a quarter (I am in the South and the AC where we play is not the best), I am sure it would last longer in other applications. I just switch the packs between quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: WOW, its a real shame this stinks so bad! If I had tried to tie that around my head/neck I would have not only had a horrible migraine, but would have been sick to boot. Wow, it smells like petroleum oil products. Whew!. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of time for minutes of refreshment
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other cooling system I purchased, this is a waste of money. The gel packs are too small to offer much cooling value, or said differently, it takes 4-hours to freeze but turns to fluid in about 15-minutes. I worn it spraying weeds on a hot day and within 15-minutes ALL the cooling value was gone. The damp towel wrap at $6.95 is a better option. It can be used immediately and provides good cooling comfort for longer periods.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Quest

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with 2 ice packs so you can have one freezing while using the other. The Velcro is a little scratchy around your neck sometimes and it's not very high quality. But for the price, it's pretty good and gets the job done. I also found you can wrap this around your forehead to help with headaches. It stays cold for about 30-45 min.
customer_reviews.author: Flyguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working outside.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use while working outside. Perfect on a hot humid day in the south.
customer_reviews.author: a1chiefan

customer_reviews.title: Works great but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Use this to walk in the mornings in Florida. Heat index of 100 and a lot of humidity, but this does it's job. No sense paying more because this product works. That being said, if the manufacturer could ad a little less flimsy fabric and velcro that would make this product almost perfect. The velcro is inadequate for proper adjustment and flimsy. It unfastens sometimes in the middle of my walk. Not acceptable. Would recommend but be mindful of the flimsiness
customer_reviews.author: William Arndt

customer_reviews.title: will only work effectively for very small necks.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have an extremely small neck, the ice pack will not reach around to cover the carotid arteries which are critical for cooling.
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, does not drip!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I used it as intended in the heat, and plan to use it for an upcoming August Disney World trip. It does not drip, as other reviewers claimed!! Very comfortable- I am just going to add an extra piece of velcro since the velcro placement makes it a bit loose on my neck, but no biggie! I wish it came in a small insulated bag to store the back up, so I bought one so the back up would be handy at the theme park. Overall, great product, and I've been trying out a lot of cooling products lately.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Halversen

customer_reviews.title: Needs redesigned
customer_reviews.text: Better off making your own with Press & Seal bags and just putting water in it and freezing them lasted Maybe an hour if you're lucky on the holiday. Also the velcro where you insert the ice packs into starts to scratch your neck after a week or two of use
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay cool very long. Didn't work nearly as well as simply putting a wet hand towel in the freezer. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I always wish it were colder, covered a few more square inches and would last longer. There is a lot of material to this item compared to the itsy bits of chunky frozen stuff. I use it sometimes because it never has leaked and I don't have anything better yet. It isn't wet and drippy like real ice. The Velcro straps are scratchy and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: B. R.

customer_reviews.title: Really works for cooling off!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who works in a very hot computer room. He says it really cools him down! However, I had hoped it would be something I could use on my daily walks when it gets so hot here in North Carolina, but it’s way too big for my neck so I won’t be ordering one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Need a better designed.
customer_reviews.text: The small ice packets only last 20 minutes. I froze both water packets overnight and then transferred them to my ice chest- both defrosted before they could effectively be used in the afternoon The fabric is too thick to allow the cool to really transfer to your neck. The Velcro end secure well, but are constantly in your way and have to be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hornaday

customer_reviews.title: Cool off with this scarf!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this ice scarf during tennis matches. The reusable, neck scarf works well to cool me off. It comes with two freezeable strips. You have to handle the Velcro ends carefully when wearing fine knit tops to avoid pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the ice pack inserts
customer_reviews.text: The idea is wonderful but the design could use some improvement. Velcro makes wearing this very uncomfortable. Purchased hoping the neoprene would keep clothing from getting. Started just using the ice packs without the cover. Cloths get wet as the ice melts but it’s better then the uncomfortable scratching when it is inside this neck band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay cold longer than an hour. Scratchy from velcro. I adjusted several times.
customer_reviews.author: CDAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Can’t be use when frozen! They freeze like round rocks.(RETURNING!)
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: scratchy on the neck
customer_reviews.text: I tried wearing this today after keeping it in the freezer for several hours. It began to scratch my neck, I believe from the velcro. I removed the gel freezer packet and will use it but the wrap itself I will save if I ever have an ankle injury.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye meyer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cold
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter in the car. She tends to get car sick, but being cool helps. We froze the inserts, but it did not stay cool for very long.
customer_reviews.author: ProudMother

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work in my part of Maryland. Had melted by the time I got to the outdoor festival today. That was 25 minutes from when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: E. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: neck/shoulder ice pack
customer_reviews.text: This works great when you need to put ice on your shoulder/neck to go to sleep. So easy to use and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Long

customer_reviews.title: Great help for summer gardening!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, this helps with overheating. Two lines of ice help. My only negative experience is that it’s scratch on a bare neck. I’ll likely use a shirt with collar, not my norm. I stayed cooler. Ice lasted about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: TenorGal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This does not lay down around my neck so I don’t feel the cold. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stays cold for a while
customer_reviews.text: It's been an awful summer here but this has really done a lot to take the edge off. Comfortable and stays cold for a while. As an added benefit, my young son came down with a high fever and we let him wear this for a few minutes - he said it made him feel better. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: gallyssa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made. It doesn't rest on the neck. The gel cubes are too bulky to cool me down. I guess I get what I paid for. I'd rather spend more money on a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: Saleana stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not bad just wish it stayed cold longer.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with an extra ice pack! I just wish i could get it tighter around my neck but I have a little neck.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They work great I have four that I keep in my freezer at work I just change them out as they thaw .
customer_reviews.author: robb

customer_reviews.title: Cover to thick to feel any cold
customer_reviews.text: This comes with two ice sleeves which was nice. But once you put them in the cover doesn't feel cold at all. No help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kriste c

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Must be near a freezer. When I’m working on the farm. It only lasts a few hours then, I have no freezer to refreeze it. Wouldn’t be good for hiking, if you’re gone all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: multi purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooling off on a super hot day. Also worked great for neck pain and a migraine.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Well made but could stay cooler longer.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good, very well made product. It just doesn't stay cool long enough, and is a bit scratchy on my throat. I will probably buy a back up, however.
customer_reviews.author: carla k

customer_reviews.title: helps beat the heat on the golf course
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping cool in the Florida heat...I used it this past summer when playing golf...put it in the freezer section of my frig overnight, then stuck it in a cooler until I needed it during the round...really helped in hot, humid conditions.
customer_reviews.author: TGD

customer_reviews.title: nice solution
customer_reviews.text: nice solution for hot weather. works and wears as described
customer_reviews.author: webdiva

customer_reviews.title: Not cold enough
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t get cold enough for me. It also only stayed cold for 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: nana2004

customer_reviews.title: wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: only stays cool for about an hour. Used it for walking on these hot humid days.
customer_reviews.author: HORSEPOOR.WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. This is my 3 Rd time buying these
customer_reviews.author: retired early

customer_reviews.title: Did work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Smells too strong like rubber and I'm allergic to rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Gitanaxu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool on hot days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neighbor who works in her yard all the time. She says it actually works keeping her cool. ( She didn't think it would work)
customer_reviews.author: Beky elrod

customer_reviews.title: Need Cooler Days?
customer_reviews.text: The velcro around the neck gets a little bit scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sister battling cancer bad she absolutely loves it. She is always hot and wears it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Cool as a as a breeze
customer_reviews.text: During our hot California weather kept me cool. Especially at night
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for cooling you off on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Hawthorne Elorreaga

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good for hot humid weather - get spare icepacks to change out
customer_reviews.author: tcmat

customer_reviews.title: Great relief
customer_reviews.text: We are working in 90 plus degree weather, trying to keep our guys cool. These worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps to keep cool when out walking the dogs. The velcro is a little itchy but holds well.
customer_reviews.author: treker13

customer_reviews.title: Not good with high heat
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Works for about 10 minutes in the heat which you would expect it to be better than that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they are a sealed unit ,easy to use and after each freezing
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The BEST review
customer_reviews.text: We use these every weekend as wedding photographers in the summer. Super helpful. Wish the ice lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for working in yard, last foe about 1 hour & get 2 so good for 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting cold
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold for a long time- hours in 90 degree heat.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This was scratchy around the neck & hardly stayed cool.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Metrick-Willetts

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great for surviving an Oklahoma summer. High-quality materials. Stays cold but doesn't get too moist. Also helped relieve a tension headache.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is being returned. The ice packlets were well frozen and lasted less than an hour before melting and warm. The collar is scratchy and uncomfortable. Very, very disappointing. A wet paper towel is better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice Pack Wrap
customer_reviews.text: Well Made, Fair Price, Comfortable. It does help trying to deal with 100+ Heat Outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M Vosburgh

customer_reviews.title: Keep it cool and it will keep you cool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use great for short stints in the heat
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Johnson

product_meta.title: Cool + Relief Cooling Ice Pack Bandana - 16 x 2.5 x 0.8 Inch Head Wrap with Cool Pads (Pack of One) in Blue
feature_bullets: STAY COOL ANYWHERE … Whether it’s hot weather, injuries, or some illness causing you to overheat, this ice pack head wrap gently keeps you cool anyplace, anytime.
EASY-FIT ADJUSTABLE DESIGN … Your new cold gel headband features an adjustable velcro strap that conveniently and comfortably fits all head sizes.
HELP SOOTHE INJURIES … This bandana with cooling packs can help comfort stiff neck muscles, splitting headaches, black eyes, and more
REUSABLE ICE INSERTS … Enjoy your cool head wrap again and again over the hot months and through any injury thanks to the refreezable cool pads inside.
WEAR IT HOWEVER YOU WANT … It’s much more than just a bandana. Get creative and enjoy the cooling gel pad sensation around your neck, eyes, face, and anywhere else!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
